ygData.msgSnippet: I think the fix for elves would be fairly simple. If they have enough int/level etc then they don t lose mana in forests, but they can t regenerate in forests

I think the fix for elves would be fairly simple. If they have enough 
int/level etc then they don't lose mana in forests, but they can't 
regenerate in forests even if they have the level/int. So, they can fire off 
a full mana bar of rocks and then they can either stay in there and not 
attack or brave coming out.
